example.text: Stay up to date on what is happening in DC Update from Washington DC US Hits Debt Ceiling This week, the Department of Treasury informed Congress that the US has reached its debt limit. The Congresswoman issued a statement urging her fellow Republicans to grow a backbone to pass some real reforms and stop crony capitalism or end up with socialism.

Click to Watch Fox and Friends Weekend The American people are tired of top down approaches and we will have to become a collaborative institution. Our debt and spending are also out of control, so we must be more strategic and hold this Administration accountable.

- PASSED 221 - 210 See the video of my floor remarks on HR 23 HERE . Read More House Establishes Select Committees H Res. 12 - Establishing a Select Subcommittee on the Weaponization of the Federal Government - ADOPTED 221 - 211 H Res. 11 - Establishing the Select Committee on the Strategic Competition Between the United States and the Chinese Communist Party - ADOPTED 365 - 65 Watch my floor remarks below.

Stay up to date on what is happening in DC Update from Washington DC US Hits Debt Ceiling This week, the Department of Treasury informed Congress that the US has reached its debt limit. The Congresswoman issued a statement urging her fellow Republicans to grow a backbone to pass some real reforms and stop crony capitalism or end up with socialism.

Click to Watch Fox and Friends Weekend The American people are tired of top down approaches and we will have to become a collaborative institution. Our debt and spending are also out of control, so we must be more strategic and hold this Administration accountable.

Today, I attended a joint [[user]] Committee & [[user]] Committee ‘Energy Lunch’ and discussed the importance of energy security for global stability at the Washington Energy Summit hosted by [[user]]. [[url]]

- PASSED 221 - 210 See the video of my floor remarks on HR 23 HERE .
